Item.Value: Hi there, $Character_14$'s my name and I'm the mason here in town. You're moving into the abandoned Manor right? Come get me when you're ready to start renovating. I also sell building materials if you find yourself short.
Hey there, $Name$,hope you're feeling well today!
Hey, $Name$, you don't happen to need any new weapons, do you? I've got a few at the shop that I think could come in handy.
Oh, hello $Name$, What can I do for you? {Talk:Talk|Never Mind:Cancel}
Great job! Now that we have a $Building_9$, we can make lots of $Item_60$s. Next up is building an $Building_7$.[Task:3]
Wow, you did that already? Great. Now any travelers that pass through will have a place to stay. This is it, $Name$. This is the first real step we take to rebuiling $Town$.
